features: ✅ ELEGANT JASMINE SCENT – Codi hand and body jasmine lotion has a wonderful jasmine scent in a very balanced amount; The fragrance is neither too overpowering to cause allergy or suffocation nor is it too light to vanish quickly; The truly unbelievable scent will bring you compliments from your friends and colleagues; Passersby on the road and passengers in commute would turn around to look at you

✅ LESS GREASY AND QUICK ABSORBENT – Not only the aroma of the Codi jasmine lotion is pleasantly phenomenal, but also it absorbs into the skin very quickly and soaks in well; Jasmine hand and body lotion by Codi is extremely hydrating and moisturizes the skin without being greasy; Rich, creamy and moisturizing formula gives you a luxurious feel and makes skin smooth, soft and supple by healing dryness

✅ GREAT QUALITY AT ECONOMICAL PRICE – Everyone can afford the non-greasy and nourishing Codi jasmine lotion with an amazing fragrance at a very economical cost; The lotion is thick and very small amount is sufficient for any part of the body; The size of the bottle is great, and one bottle may last for months making it very economical; The pump makes it easy and fast to use

✅ PERFECT GIFT IDEA - This is an ideal gift for those who are extra conscious about their skin; Even those who do not care much about the skin would love this great lotion; Buy this for your loved ones, and this lotion with pomegranate scent and smooth texture would remind them of you every day; The attractive design of the bottle make it suitable for placing it anywhere in the house, and it will add to the beauty of the place

✅ GUARANTEED SATISFACTION – We are one hundred percent sure that you would always like Codi’s nourishing jasmine formula; Your body would love the fresh and wonderful after feelings of this lotion; If you face any problem with our product, leave us a message and our representative will take care of everything; Don’t miss the opportunity, Click ADD TO CART Now
body.description: Codi jasmine hand and body lotion with wonderful jasmine aroma absorbs quickly into the skin and does not leave skin greasy and sticky. This highly nourishing lotion comes at a very economical price for sufficient quantity and is an ideal gift for your loved ones with guaranteed satisfaction. Intensive nourishing codi body lotion for feet, hands, and body - Codi lotion will instantly make your skin feel smooth and hydrated while leaving a pleasant aroma behind. ELEGANT NATURAL SCENTJust the right amount of heavenly jasmine scent keeps you fresh, active, and energetic. It does not come with a strongly overpowering fragrance that causes suffocation. The fragrance lingers throughout the day and does not disappear quickly, so that you can enjoy it for a longer time. Apply this codi hand lotion on your hands, face, and arms before going to bed and enjoy a pleasant sleep. NO GREASY FEELCodi hand cream for women and men is not greasy and makes skin smooth and soft. This scented body lotion absorbs very quickly and heals the skin perfectly INSTANT HYDRATIONThis relaxing jasmine oil for women and men is extremely hydrating and nourishes skin fresh and moisturized. It goes easy on the body and works wonders for body massage. Ingredients: Ingredients: Water, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Isopropyl Myristate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Microcrystalline Wax, PEG-40 Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Urea, Stearic Acid, Fragrance, Glyceryl Stearate, Carbomer, Methylparaben, Triethanolamine, Propylparaben, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Disodium EDTA Codi jasmine lotion is a great treat for your dear body; BUY IT NOW to keep your body fresh and smooth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my hands so soft!
reviews.reviewText: Th Codi Green Tea hand and body lotion is one of the best lotions that I have ever had.My hands are so soft and the scent is nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Although a touch more expensive than your traditional lotions, it is well worth it! I am very picky with lotions and struggle to find ones that I enjoy, for one reason or another. It has a pleasant, very mild scent, which is fantastic considering I have a sensitivity to perfumes. It is quick absorbing and non greasy, feels like instant relief to dry or irritated skin. I keep one in my bag everywhere I go, one in my car, and one in my bathroom. I will definitely be buying this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love!
reviews.reviewText: I had to buy this product after seeing it at my nail salon. The scent is GREAT! Fragrant without being overpowering. Winter is brutal on my hands and this lotion fights the dry/cracked skin flawlessly. Worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great smelling lotion and not too greasy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the best product!
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent and it moisturizes better than all other brands that I've tried.I discovered this lotion at my nail salon.Highly recommended!!

reviews.reviewText: I like the texture and how smoothly it went on the body and I like the scent!

reviews.reviewText: This lotion was initially a gift but I have continued to purchase it. It has a very nice scent. It softens and moisturizes so well.
